course_description: Applies economic analysis and methods to business problems, using elementary level linear programming, input/output analysis, and game theory. Traditional topics in managerial economics, such as cost and demand analysis, capital budgeting, and cost-benefit analysis.
prerequisites: This course requires ECON 201 OR ECON_OX201 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 3310, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 2:30-3:45p, Instructor: M. Arbatskaya, Status: Open
